name: kentutils

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: builtin_htslib
variants.description: Build with bundled htslib (using an external htslib may lead to errors)

description:
Jim Kent command line bioinformatic utilities and libraries This
bundles a custom version of htslib, but can be overridden with ~htslib.
Consider adding the ^mysql+client_only dependency to avoid building all
mysql/mariadb.

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: htslib
dependencies.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.

dependencies.name: libiconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: mysql-client
dependencies.description: MySQL is an open source relational database management system.

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description: Placeholder package for Apple's analogue to non-GNU libuuid

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
